kizuna_language_a_02:
Did you come all the way here to the staff room
just to see me?[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_a_03:
Hahaha! Seems I’ve finally made it into the hearts
of my students! That makes me très happy![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_a_04:
After all, like I said in class, communication is
very important![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_a_05:
If there’s anything you’re confused about in class,
or if you’re having trouble here at the academy...[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_a_06:
you can always come here and tell me, ton ami
Salvatore—your friend Salvatore, that is! Ouais![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_a_system_01: You became slightly closer with Mr. Salvatore!
